name: Patient Transfer Chair - Electric
description:
**(This item is new, only used once)**
The Height Adjustable Easy Transfer Chair makes transferring easy and reduces strain. 
This innovative design has reinvented patient transfer by minimising the movement of the user, while allowing caregivers to avoid back strain from carrying out transfers daily.
This is electric-operated via a wired controller or remote control to make it easy to ascend/descend the chair. Just charge the battery and use.

Features:
· Makes transfers easy
· Minimises user's movement
· Reduces caregiver's risk of injury
· Affordable and easier to use compared to patient hoists
· Comes with a cushion for added comfort
